body_html:
Are you talking about torch/tensor.py? It defines only base tensor class and does not contain any functional API, adding einsum here seems strange...
And how is torch/functional.py related to autograd?

body:
Are you talking about `torch/tensor.py`? It defines only base tensor class and does not contain any functional API, adding `einsum` here seems strange...
And how is `torch/functional.py` related to autograd?
